page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: Farming is in fact the main occupation of the people in the area.It is mainly hill sheep farming but there are a few dairy and one chicken farm.The nearest animal markets are at Penistone and Bakewell where the farmers sell their products.There is a small area of arable land where turnips and potatoes are grown and some grass is cut for sileage. At present,hill sheep is a profitable activity since there is a generous subsidy. A hamlet called {Loadbrook}consists of a renovated farmhouse and connected outbuildings,and across the road,a leased farm which is more productive than the farm owner's holding.
